title: (x) "Joe Lean and The Jing Jang Jong" elegant unicase didone - Perla {Ryuk}
content:
seems abit Bodoni-ish but what is it?????  
(sorry for such a small pic)

author: neill k

comments.content: thats amazing, thankyou!!!!! is it a freeware font? is there somewhere i can download it for free?

No. Buy it you cheapskate.

Nick Cooke

Sheesh… Do you realize how much you contradict yourself?

If you really _really_ want that font, this means it is worth at least _something_ to you. But on the other hand by asking us where you can download it for free, you actually say it’s worth nothing to you. What is it? Is this typeface worth something to you, or nothing? Make up your mind fer chrissakes! :^/

US$75,- at [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011162719/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ALT0000117#specimen), Heck, that’s, like, what, less than a Euro! :^P I’m sure you can pay that amount for such a beautiful and unique typeface.
